Package com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RMIRemoteStub
    This dummy interface is used to mark an object as RMI-compatible.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocateRMIRegistry
    The class only contains one method, which returns the RMI Registry Client for a given endpoint if valid.
    RemoteObjectRef
    This class holds the Remote Object Reference, which contains the hostname and port number for the RMI Service Host.
    RMIMethodHandler  
    RMIRegistry
    This class contains the entry point of RMI Registry Server.
    RMIRegistryClient
    This class provides methods to interact with an RMI Registry Server from a client's perspective.
    RMIRegistryServer
    Runnable class for RMI Registry Server.
    RMIService
    This class contains the entry point for an RMI Servant.
    RoREntryTable
    This class holds all Remote Object References within a RMI Service Host.
